definition: Shanxi province (Shansi) in north China between Hebei and Shaanxi, abbr. 晋 capital Taiyuan 太原
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
surname Shan
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
west
to inspect/to examine/to be aware/to pay a visit (to one's parents or elders)
to save/to economize/to do without/to omit/to leave out/province/(archaic) central government department

sentences.english: Wutai Mountain located at Shanxi Province northeast within the boundaries of Wutai County.
sentences.chinese: 五臺山位於山西省東北部五臺縣境內。

sentences.english: Purple garlic of Ying county is famous with its quality.
sentences.chinese: 山西省應縣的紫皮大蒜在國內久負盛名。

sentences.english: Yuanqu county located at the south of Shanxi province, the northeast of Yuncheng .
sentences.chinese: 垣曲縣位於山西省南端，運城地區東北隅。

sentences.english: In Shansi province two storey and one and a half storey houses are typical.
sentences.chinese: 在山西省，典型的住房是兩層和一層半。

sentences.english: Collapse of mined-out area in coal mines is the chief geologic disaster in Shanxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 煤礦採空塌陷是山西省地質災害的主要災種。

sentences.english: Wang Jiwen was born in Xin'zhuang Village, Jicheng, Shanxi province in 1934.
sentences.chinese: 王吉文，1934年出生于山西省翼城縣辛莊村。

sentences.english: The paper starts on taking the case of Anchang village, outskirts of Changzhi in Shanxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 本文以山西省長治市郊區安昌村爲例展開論述。

sentences.english: The resources of entomogenous fungi in Shanxi Province were studied.
sentences.chinese: 對山西省蟲生真菌的種類資源概貌進行了總結。

sentences.english: Highway has contributed greatly toe conomic development in Shanxi.
sentences.chinese: 公路爲山西省經濟發展做出巨大的貢獻。

sentences.english: Is the representative of shanxi opera, one of the big bang for Shanxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 是山西省的代表性劇種，爲山西省的四大梆子之一。

sentences.english: Shanxi confirmed human avian influenza cases, patients recovered and were discharged today.
sentences.chinese: 山西省確診的人禽流感個案，患者於今日康復出院。

sentences.english: Where has Shanxi Province Tai Yuan City to sell displacement washing vehicle machine's?
sentences.chinese: 山西省太原市哪裏有賣移動洗車機的？

sentences.english: Sino-Japanese War early, Linfen in Shanxi Province for seven administrative districts in the 6th District.
sentences.chinese: 抗日戰爭初期，臨汾爲山西省7個行政區中的第6區。

sentences.english: Analysis on technology and economy of coal mine drainage system;
sentences.chinese: 以山西省引黃入晉抽水系統爲研究時象。

sentences.english: In mountainous Shansi province, near the northern Mongolia border, this is especially true.
sentences.chinese: 北面鄰近蒙古邊界多山的山西省，情況尤其是這樣。
